content.rendered:
One-Secure defines “Personal Data” as any information that can be used to directly identify an individual.The Service License and Product Agreement (the “User Agreement”) defines any capitalized terms not defined in this Privacy Policy.One-Secure.com may periodically update this Privacy Policy.One-Secure.com will post a notice on its websites in the event of materially significant changes to the Privacy Policy.

PERSONAL IDENTIFICATION INFORMATION We may collect personal identification information from Users in a variety of ways, such as when they visit our website, purchase a product, or fill out a form. Users may be asked for their name, email address, phone number, and address, depending on the circumstances.However, anonymous visitors to our website are welcome.Users will only be asked to provide us with personal identification information if they voluntarily do so.Except that it may prevent them from participating in certain activities that are related to the Site, users always have the option of refusing to provide personally identifiable information.

How We Protect Your Information We use security measures and appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction data, and data stored on our Site.

CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY Interactive Knowledge System reserves the right to amend this privacy statement at any time.We will update the updated date at the bottom of this page when we do.To stay up to date on how we protect the personal information we collect, we encourage users to frequently check this page for changes.You agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy on a regular basis and be aware of any changes.

Your calls may be recorded for the purpose of our internal monitoring of service quality.You would be informed of this explicitly, and you are free to disconnect the call and request a call that might not be recorded.

COOKIES AND PASSIVE DATA COLLECTION One-Secure.com collects passive data in the form of a cookie, an IP address, and a URL in order to enhance the Service and offer Users enhanced or geographically differentiated features and service levels when they are available.Cookies are used by One-Secure.com to save user screen names and session validations on users’ browsers and hard drives. These cookies may also be used to tailor products and services to users as they become available.

In addition, IP addresses assist us in the administration and delivery of the Service to our Users, as well as in diagnosing network congestion and server issues.

Your personal information could be used for:

enable you to download and purchase products, gain access to services, and participate in offered activities

We do not rent or sell your personal information to anyone else.

We may share some of your personal information with:

a select group of partners providing services for us.

Some of your personal information, like your address or phone number, may be shared with certain partners so that they can contact you about our products on our behalf.

Lastly, we may share your personal information:

when it is necessary to deliver the product you need, like when we use a payment card processor to process your credit card transaction;

when required to comply with a valid legal process or when authorized by law;

when it is necessary to safeguard our products’ security or the rights or property of the company.

when it is necessary to safeguard the rights, personal safety, or property of the public, the company, its clients, or employees, or in connection with a sale of our business in whole or in part.

Unless prohibited by law, we will make commercially reasonable efforts to notify you in advance of any disclosure of your personal data if we are required to do so by law.We will adhere to this Privacy Policy during any merger, acquisition, or asset sale, and users who are affected will be informed if personal data is transferred to a third party or is subject to a different privacy policy as a result.

Your rights with regard to your data You have the right to inquire about the personal data we process about you, as well as the purpose and nature of the processing. You also have the right to learn who we share your data with.

At any time, you have the right to request that your personal data be updated, corrected, or deleted.Please be aware that we may keep your personal data for one year after you stop being a customer, unless you ask us to delete it. However, we typically keep your personal data for no longer than is reasonably necessary given the purposes for which it was collected.

You have every right to expect us to safeguard your personal data.We put in a lot of effort to safeguard both our security products and the information we hold for our customers from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.Specific examples:

With regard to any and all data we collect from you, we always adhere to this Privacy Policy. We limit the use and disclosure of your personal data and work to ensure that anyone with whom we share it treats it with the privacy and security it deserves.In addition, in order to safeguard and secure the information we collect, we have implemented physical, technical, and administrative procedures that are accepted by the industry.

One-Secure.

Except to process credit card information for orders, One-Secure.com does not disclose Personal Data to third parties.However, One-Secure.com may in the future need to provide users’ Personal Data to third parties in order to provide specific services (like hosting or support) to the user.One-Secure.com will, at a minimum, require the third party to certify that they follow privacy protections comparable to Data-Align’s. These third parties will be required to adhere to Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.Additionally, users will have the option to prevent these third parties from viewing their Personal Data.

One-Secure’s legal requirements.Unless it is required to comply with an enforceable government request, such as a warrant, I do not disclose Personal Data.

CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP We reserve the right to transfer all One-Secure.com User information, including Personal Data, to a different entity in the event of a change in ownership or a direct merger or acquisition with another entity.Any time there is a change in ownership, merger, or acquisition of One-Secure.com assets by a third party, we will notify you (via posting on our website or email to the email address you provide when you register), and you can choose to change any of your registration information at that time.

One-Secure.com safeguards the information under our control with security measures that meet or exceed industry standards.One-Secure.com cannot guarantee complete security, despite our best efforts to store the information collected by One-Secure.com in a secure operating environment that is not accessible to the general public.In addition, we cannot guarantee that our security measures will prevent third-party “crackers” from obtaining this information, even though we take reasonable measures to guarantee the integrity and security of our network and systems.

You have the option of updating or correcting the information you have provided to One-Secure at any time.me by updating your website account.

Your Personal Data and other information may be retained in our backup or archive records even if you cancel your account.

CONTACTING US If you have any inquiries regarding this Privacy Policy, the site’s practices, or your interactions with the site, please contact us at info@One-Secure.com.
